quotes.quote: The person who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd.
Walking into the crowd was like sinking into a stew - you became an ingredient, you took on a certain flavour.
The mob is the mother of tyrants.
The intelligence of that creature known as a crowd is the square root of the number of people in it.
A crowd has the collective wisdom of individual ignorance.
Those who follow the crowd usually get lost in it.
Following the crowd is cool if you want to go where the crowd is going. Never fear being the odd one out in order to achieve your own goals.
Don’t follow the crowd, let the crowd follow you.
Whenever you enter the crowds, keep your own personality, keep your own behaviour, keep your own mind; stay as yourself!

The crowd, in fact, is composed of individuals; it must therefore be in every man's power to become what he is, an individual. From becoming an individual no one, no one at all, is excluded, except he who excludes himself by becoming a crowd.
The mob rushes in where individuals fear to tread.
The crowd has a way of being right.
There is never a crowd on the leading edge.
Inside a crowd, you have no right to complain about the crowdedness, because you are already a part of it!
A crowd exists so long as it has an unattained goal.
The crowd is the same everywhere, in all periods and cultures; it remains essentially the same among men of the most diverse origin, education and language.
A crowd is not company, and faces are but a gallery of pictures.
When you stand in the crowd you stand like the cloud baseless. But when you stand out of the crowd you're outstanding like the proud limitless. Stand out to be outstanding.
The man who follows a crowd will never be followed by a crowd.
To rise above the crowd, you must discipline yourself unceasingly to the strict demand and realities of your ambition.
The only certain about following the crowd is that you will all get there together.
Society! It's a crowd thing!
Crowds speak in heroes.
Every crowd has a silver lining.
